title: Haltwhistle Burn Roman Fortlet and Camp
description: Site of Roman fortlet and temporary camp. The fortlet guarded the crossing of the Burn by the Stanegate. It pre-dates the construction of Hadrian's Wall, which passes 0.5 km to the north.

properties.description: After Historic England, verified with Google Maps imagery.
properties.title: Imagery location of center point of fortlet
